original_text: And it came to pass in those days, when there was no king in Israel, that there was a certain Levite sojourning on the side of mount Ephraim, who took to him a concubine out of Bethlehemjudah.
korean_text: 이스라엘에 왕이 없을 그 때에 에브라임 산지 구석에 거류하는 어떤 레위 사람이 유다 베들레헴에서 첩을 맞이하였더니

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass in those days
when there was no king in Israel
that there was a certain Levite
sojourning on the side of mount Ephraim
who took to him a concubine
